column1: AI Poses a Greater Threat To Society then it Does as a Benefit.
Foreign Relations end up Costing the U.S. more than Benefiting them.
The U.S. should not be involved in the Middle East.
The U.S. Should Implement a Nationwide Vaccine Mandate.
The U.S. Should Increase Federal Funding for the Arts.
The U.S. Should Implement a Nationwide Rent Control Policy.
